1370: Wederic moved to Die lange straet2.A.6 after marriage.
Got married to Emmelina at age 22 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Emmelina, Emmelina, at age 22.
1372: Had a son with Emmelina, Wolcout, at age 24.
1373: Lost son Wolcout when Wolcout was 2 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Scilla, at age 26.
1375: Had a son with Emmelina, Sander, at age 27.
1377: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Cecilia, at age 29.
1378: Had a son with Emmelina, Bernardus, at age 30.
1379: Lost son Bernardus when Bernardus was 2 years old.
1390: Had a son with Emmelina, Rodolf, at age 42.
